SEARCH
Package Hotel

Class Model

java.lang.Object
Hotel.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model class manages a list of hotels and provides methods to manipulate hotel data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Model()
    Constructs a Model object with an empty list of hotels.

    • setHotelName

      public int setHotelName(String currentName, String newName)
      Sets the name of a hotel object given its current name.
      Parameters:
      currentName - - current name of the hotel being renamed
      newName - - new name of the hotel being renamed
      Returns:
      0 if no hotel with the old name exists, 1 if name is not unique, 2 if renaming was successful

      Parameters:
      nameOfHotel - the name of the hotel
      strRoomToRemove - the name of the room to remove
      Returns:
      0 if the hotel was not found, 1 if room has reservation, 2 if the room was successfully removed
